metadata.title: CVE-2017-6310 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in tnef before 1.4.13. Four type confusions havebeen identified in the file_add_mapi_attrs() function. These might lead toinvalid read and write operations, controlled by an attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tnef - 1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tnef package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1').
